description: This decadent vegan smoothie is flavored with vanilla and rich sesame tahini with a sprinkling of cinnamon. The perfect summer treat.
name: Tahini Vanilla Milkshake Smoothie
recipeIngredient: 1 cup unflavored soy or almond milk
agave or maple syrup to taste (optional)

recipeInstructions.text: Place all ingredients except cinnamon into blender. Blend until smooth, stopping to scrape down sides of pitcher as needed.
Pour into glasses and sprinkle with cinnamon.
